mutants.code:
def can_john_make_living(f0, p, c0, n, i):
    p = p * 100.0
    i = i / 100.0
    f = f0
    c = c0
    for _ in range(n - 1):
        f = int(f * (1 + p) - c)
        if f < 0:
            return False
        c = int(c * (1 + i))
    return True
